message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a premium price of $19,000. I believe it holds significant value and this reflects its worth.
I'm interested in the product, but $19,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $14,000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'd like to see some flexibility on the price.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $19,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $15,500. I'm trying to stay within my budget, and I think this is a fair compromise.
